did.unittitle: Margaret P. Childs Brooklyn photograph collection
did.abstract: Photographs in the collection show houses, roof views, street views, and residents of Columbia Heights in the Brooklyn Heights neighborhood.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Margaret P. Childs Brooklyn photograph collection dates from circa 1940 and contains 6 items. Photographs in the collection show houses, roof views, street views, and residents of Columbia Heights in the Brooklyn Heights neighborhood. Photographs are identified by location and subject names.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: Item-level description and digital versions of images from the collection are available for searching via the image database in the library.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Based on the date range of this collection, all items in the collection will enter the public domain by 2060. For information on securing rights to publish or reproduce, please see the Brooklyn Historical Society Reproduction Rights Policy.
